doc.field: Jacki Apple was a visual, performance, and media artist based out of Pasadena, California. Her radio show Soundings, of which she was the host and producer, was on KPFK-FM Los Angeles Public Radio from 1981-1995. Her website, which she designed, provides a retrospective of her career. It contains images of her photography, drawings, and installations; listings of her scripts and scores; her discography; song lyrics and band members; gallery installation descriptions and images; information on "The Culture of Disappearance" project; writings on sound and radio; select images from her artist books; and other critical writings. Sections of her website, such as teaching, proposals, and professional activities, list out subcategories, but are not browseable.
Crawl was limited to domains and subdomains of jackiapple.com in order to remain within the collection scope and data constraints.

Due to technical or privacy issues, archived websites may not be exact copies of the original website at the time of the web crawl. Certain file types will not be captured dependent on how they are embedded in the site. Other parts of websites that the crawler has difficulty capturing includes Javascript, streaming content, database-driven content, and highly interactive content. Full-Text searches of archived websites are available at https://archive-it.org/organizations/567.
